manual/intro.html.title: Introduction | Shiang v0.1.1
manual/intro.html.keywords: Introduction The game is for Barloy, RanRan and all of the Babinos. Idea The initial idea of developing this game is to celebrate the Piggy-Goat Day. This wonderful festival is also known as the Shiang Day. Main charactor The game tells a story about the advanture of RanRan, a.k.a. the king of SanXingDui. We haven't decided yet how the story should go..
